TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstanceData extends System.Object

summary.span: 保存與效能計數器樣本相關的執行個體 (Instance) 資料。

span.span: Holds instance data associated with a performance counter sample.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的內容存在於特定的物件本機電腦上。The following code example displays the contents of the objects that exist in a particular on the local computer. 它會顯示目的編號的清單類別。It first displays a numbered list of categories. 使用者輸入的其中一個類別目錄數目之後，此範例會顯示針對每個中，每個執行個體相關聯的執行個體資料。After the user enters the number of one of the categories, the sample displays, for each in the , the instance data associated with each instance of the .
